project_name: Remrin AOL-Style Chat Rooms - Complete Implementation
aesthetic: Windows 95 / AOL Instant Messenger nostalgia - MUST maintain this retro look!
primary_objective: Build a fully functional, real-time chat room system inspired by 1990s/2000s AOL chat rooms with Windows 95 UI aesthetic. This should feel EXACTLY like using AOL in 1999.

elements_required: Courier New font for chat messages
MS Sans Serif for UI elements
Outset buttons that inset when clicked

database_schema.instruction: Create these tables in Supabase PostgreSQL

tables.name: chat_rooms
columns: id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4()
is_official BOOLEAN DEFAULT false -- true for Remrin-created rooms
max_users INT DEFAULT 23 -- classic AOL limit!

tables.name: chat_messages
columns: id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4()
room_id UUID REFERENCES chat_rooms(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
indexes: CREATE INDEX idx_messages_room ON chat_messages(room_id, created_at DESC)
rls: ALTER TABLE chat_messages ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY
CREATE POLICY messages_read ON chat_messages FOR SELECT USING (true)
CREATE POLICY messages_insert ON chat_messages FOR INSERT WITH CHECK (auth.uid() = user_id)

tables.name: room_members
columns: room_id UUID REFERENCES chat_rooms(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
user_id UUID REFERENCES auth.users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE

tables.name: direct_messages
columns: id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4()
from_user_id UUID REFERENCES auth.users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
to_user_id UUID REFERENCES auth.users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
indexes: CREATE INDEX idx_dm_conversation ON direct_messages(from_user_id, to_user_id, created_at)
CREATE INDEX idx_dm_unread ON direct_messages(to_user_id, read)

tables.name: buddy_lists
columns: user_id UUID REFERENCES auth.users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
buddy_id UUID REFERENCES auth.users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE

tables.name: user_profiles_chat
columns: user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY REFERENCES auth.users(id)

tables.name: ignored_users
columns: user_id UUID REFERENCES auth.users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
ignored_user_id UUID REFERENCES auth.users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE

tables.name: room_bans
columns: room_id UUID REFERENCES chat_rooms(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
user_id UUID REFERENCES auth.users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE

enable_realtime: ALTER PUBLICATION supabase_realtime ADD TABLE chat_messages
ALTER PUBLICATION supabase_realtime ADD TABLE room_members
ALTER PUBLICATION supabase_realtime ADD TABLE direct_messages
supabase_realtime_setup.note: Enable Realtime in Supabase dashboard for these tables

Display all users currently in room
Show user count at top: 'People Here: X'
